original_text: For the third time he spoke to them: “Why? What crime has this man committed? I have found in him no grounds for the death penalty. Therefore I will have him punished and then release him.”
korean_text: 빌라도가 세 번째 말하되 이 사람이 무슨 악한 일을 하였느냐 나는 그에게서 죽일 죄를 찾지 못하였나니 때려서 놓으리라 하니

sentences.original_text: For the third time he spoke to them:
What crime has this man committed?
I have found in him no grounds for the death penalty.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그에게서 사형에 대한 근거를 찾지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Therefore I will have him punished
